title: Failed to install depenency package 'lru' via pip.
body:
I was noticed for `py-evm/eth/consensus/clique/snapshot_manager.py : ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'lru'`,   so I use `pip install lru` to add dependency. And I recieved this:   

```
Defaulting to user installation because normal site-packages is not writeable
Collecting lru
  Using cached lru-0.1.tar.gz (1.1 kB)
    ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1:
     command: /home/gooyj/anaconda3/bin/python -c 'import io, os, sys, setuptools, tokenize; sys.argv[0] = '"'"'/tmp/pip-install-yndiwgfm/lru_21ef715dace544bdb3885a1502193706/setup.py'"'"'; __file__='"'"'/tmp/pip-install-yndiwgfm/lru_21ef715dace544bdb3885a1502193706/setup.py'"'"';f = getattr(tokenize, '"'"'open'"'"', open)(__file__) if os.path.exists(__file__) else io.StringIO('"'"'from setuptools import setup; setup()'"'"');code = f.read().replace('"'"'\r\n'"'"', '"'"'\n'"'"');f.close();exec(compile(code, __file__, '"'"'exec'"'"'))' egg_info --egg-base /tmp/pip-pip-egg-info-qzo86m8k
         cwd: /tmp/pip-install-yndiwgfm/lru_21ef715dace544bdb3885a1502193706/
    Complete output (8 lines):
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "/tmp/pip-install-yndiwgfm/lru_21ef715dace544bdb3885a1502193706/setup.py", line 2, in <module>
        from lru import __version__ as version
      File "/tmp/pip-install-yndiwgfm/lru_21ef715dace544bdb3885a1502193706/lru.py", line 18
        raise KeyError, key
                      ^
    SyntaxError: invalid syntax
    ----------------------------------------
WARNING: Discarding https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/c3/e0/1d74333975c41e22b5f83e18d9ea210dd5e9098d0c2907546be303e4f5f1/lru-0.1.tar.gz#sha256=1e4bd95a74ab89738c74ef1631cad3ee06c94086cd491e8c144203c0962dce36 (from https://pypi.org/simple/lru/). Command errored out with exit status 1: python setup.py egg_info Check the logs for full command output.
ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement lru (from versions: 0.1)
ERROR: No matching distribution found for lru
```

Maybe this 'lru' dependency need update.
